Coursework Portfolio
Please hover and click the slides for detail


Capstone Project
Our team decides to create social media page that would pair users with similar interests!

While most social media site offers to connect with people we already know, the purpose of our creation is getting to know people we don't yet know that shares similarity. Site features security implementation, registration, email authentication, user pairing, search, and real-time chat!

Quality Assurance

Software quality assures that all software engineering processes, methods, activities and work items are monitored and comply against the defined standards.


This software testing assignment particularly concerns the discovery of application defects through the usage of black and white testing methods.

IOT Research
In this research, we propose a centralized management system by utlizing the IoT devices alongside cloud server for an effective streetlight management.

Across the world, street lighting has long played an important role in the city. However, existing challenges hinders the city's ability for effective street light management. An IOT solution aims to address these concerns through environment, electrical, and network centraled parameters to better manage the system.

Project
Management

Forum ResetEra is a popular discussion platform. The goal of the project is to capture key information from the ResetEra forums to learn about its feature and content.


This semester long project consists of three months design and one month implementation for a web cralwer application.
